comments:
With Eclipse 3.0 final

I've got a quite annoying message warning me about an 'AST creation error'.
An error dialog opens about 5 times successively with this message. 

I'm using a plugin, implementors, that produces also an error but i don't know
if this is the cause of the AST issue. 
The file where this error appear contains a reference to an interface that i
have deleted. 

Here is the log of the error:
